name: Dodge The Bees!!!
description:
Louise used to be the bee's knees, but then came a sneeze that awoke the bees. 
Now Louise needs his abilities to escape the reach of these bees.

The theme of the jam was "Fast & Slow" so I made a small arcade dodging game, where your ability is constantly switching between a quick dash and slowing down time.

CONTROLS:
- WASD / ←↑↓→ /  2456 : Movement
- SPACE / 0 : Action
- ESC / # :  Back

RESOURCES:
- Music : Nokia 3310 Mozart 30 ringtone made with Composer Emulator
- Font : by Gizmo199 from the official Nokia Jam Resources
- SFX : TRIX SOUND PACK from the official Nokia Jam Resources

Dodge The Bees!!! is my entry for the  2023 Nokia Jam 5.
